SignInPage.title: Welcome back
SignInPage.description: Enter your email to sign in to your account.

SignUpPage.title: Create an account
SignUpPage.description: Enter your email below to create your account.

ForgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot your password?
ForgotPasswordPage.description: Enter your email address below and we will send you a message to reset your password.

ResetPasswordPage.title: Reset your password
ResetPasswordPage.description: Please enter your new password below.

SecurityPage.title: Change Password
SecurityPage.description: Your password must be at least 6 characters long and must be different from your previous password.

AppearancePage.description1: Select the theme for the dashboard.
AppearancePage.description2: Select the language for the dashboard.

AccountPage.description2: Deleting your account cannot be reversed.

DeleteAccountDialog.title: Delete Account
DeleteAccountDialog.description: Deleting your account cannot be reversed.

marketing_emails.label: Marketing emails
marketing_emails.description: Receive emails about new products, features, and more.

security_emails.label: Security emails
security_emails.description: Receive emails about your account activity and security.

FormLabel.name: Name
FormLabel.verify_delete_my_account: To verify, type delete my account below.

FormMessage.email_has_already_been_added: This email has already been added.
FormMessage.email_has_already_been_registered: This email has already been registered.
FormMessage.email_has_been_successfully_sent: Your email has been sent successfully.
FormMessage.invalid_login_credentials: Your email or password does not match.
FormMessage.new_password_should_be_different_from_th: New password should be different from the old password.
FormMessage.you_have_been_logged_out_successfully: You have been logged out successfully.
FormMessage.you_have_successfully_registered_as_a_me: You have successfully registered as a member.

FormDescription.this_is_the_name_that_appears_on_your_pr: This is the name that appears on your profile and email.
FormDescription.you_can_manage_your_email_address_in_you: You can manage verified email addresses in your <link1>email settings</link1>.

SelectValue.select_a_verified_email_to_display: Select a verified email to display

Textarea.please_tell_us_a_little_about_yourself: Please tell us a little about yourself.

Hero.title: Welcome to Acme Inc
Hero.description: We provide high quality services for your business.

SignUpPolicyLink.paragraph: By clicking Sign Up, you agree to our <link1>Terms of Service</link1> and <link2>Privacy Policy</link2>.

RelatedLink.signup: Don't have an account? Sign Up
RelatedLink.signin: Already have an account? Sign In

EmailItem.title: Primary
EmailItem.description: This email will be used for account-related notifications and may also be used to reset your password.

ReceivesNotifications.title: Receives notifications
ReceivesNotifications.description: This email address is the default used for notifications.

UnverifiedEmails.title: Unverified
UnverifiedEmails.description: Unverified email addresses cannot receive notifications and cannot be used to reset your password.

VisibleInEmails.title: Visible in emails
VisibleInEmails.description: This email may be used as your profile and author address.

NotVisibleInEmails.title: Not visible in emails
NotVisibleInEmails.description: This email cannot be used as your profile or author address.

PrimaryEmailAddress.title: Primary email address
PrimaryEmailAddress.description: Your primary email address may be used to receive account-related notifications and reset your password.

DeleteEmailAddress.AlertDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to remove this email from your account?
DeleteEmailAddress.AlertDialogDescription: Once deleted, this email address will no longer be associated with your account.
